item.title: Day 1 - Day Trading
item.description: If you read my previous post then you’ll know that my first major step to becoming financially free was to educate myself. I needed to learn money. As strange as that sounds I never learned money. You probably didn’t either. I can almost guarantee you weren’t taught money in school. You were taught to work for money so you were taught skills, albeit, mostly useless skills depending on your current occupation.
